overview: WORLD SPINS MADLY ON is a fun and quirky film about a two people who need a little help from the Universe to find each other…and it’s about the the power of possibility.  Jeremy Jed Hammel (producer of “The Legacy” – Best Film, San Diego Comic Con) directed, edited, and wrote the film, which won Best Romantic Screenplay at the 2013 Woods Hole Film Festival contest.  WHFF was named Top 50 Film Festivals Worth the Entry Fee and Top 25 Coolest Film Festivals by Moviemaker.
title: World Spins Madly On
